live_updates: Tech crews continue to work in the area to restore services. Thank you for your patience.
Technical crews continue working diligently to resolve this outage.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
47426.summary: Some customers in Redwater are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
47426.title: Mar 7 - Redwater | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
